subject: Re: Parrot Project Management...
body:
On May 21, 2007, at 7:15 PM, James E Keenan wrote:

> Will Coleda wrote:
>
>> If you notice any missing documentation, please open an RT ticket  
>> with [DOCS] in the subject. ((It won't be processed specially by  
>> RT, but will help me search.)) Ask on the list. Send patches,  
>> either to the parrot repo or the website.
>
> If we're proposing revisions to existing documentation, should we  
> continue to use the [PATCH] flag?

Yes please.

--
Will "Coke" Coleda
will@coleda.com
